chapter.title: Security
chapter.note: Security in JSR-160 remoting is an all-or-nothing option. Either all MBeans are accesible or none (except your application server uses a SecurityManager, but that is rarely the case). Jolokia on the other hand alllows for fine grained security defined in a security policy. It allows for access restrictions on MBean names (or patterns), attributes, operation, source IP address (or a subnet) and type of Jolokia operation. This chapter will talk about this.
